full_product_name: SCISHION V88 Android TV Box  - RK3229 CPU, 4K, Android 5.1,  KODI,  WIFI,  3D Movie Support, 4 X USB, SD Card Slot
overview:
Key Features...

  • Powerful Rockchip RK3299 Quad Core CPU and Mali GPU for a performance you can rely on
  • Kodi 16.1 Media player brings entertainment for all the family
  • User friendly Android 5.1 operating system is quick and easy to navigate
  • Great connectivity with Wi-FI, 4 USB ports, SPDIF, AV and SD card support

Kodi TV Box


With its Rockchip RK3229 CPU the V88 TV Box brings a solid performance and the Cortex-A7 processor teamed with a Mali-400MP CPU you get a richer viewing experience that supports 4K resolutions. The 3840 by 2160 pixel output of this TV box is equivalent to two 1080P screens so you're ready for the 4K revolution. With a 4K TV you can enjoy this amazing detail making you feel like you're in the middle of the action, especially as this TV Box supports 3D movies for immersive viewing.

Kodi 16.1 media player comes preinstalled and will open the door to a wide range of repositories that offer thousands of channels for free! This lets you select the best of TV and movies from around the globe streaming them direct to the TV box over your home Wi-Fi or via an Ethernet line as the TV box supports both internet connections options.

Android 5.1 Smart TV Box



4 USB ports on the V88 TV box let you hook up all your peripherals such as mouse, keyboard, gamepad or camera. An Android 5.1 operating system offers all the productivity and entertainment support you need with access to the Google Play store. 8GB of onboard storage along with SD card support ensure there's enough space for all your needs letting this smart TV box become your go to media centre serving up entertainment for all the family.

The V88 TV Box comes with a 12 months warranty, brought to you by the leader in electronic devices as well as wholesale Android TV Boxes.

full_product_name: H96 Pro+ Android TV Box - S912 Octa Core CPU, 3GB RAM, Android 6.0, Kodi, Dual Band Wi-Fi, 4Kx2K
overview:
Key Features...
  • Octa-Core Amlogic S912 CPU and 3GB RAM delivers a lightning quick performance
  • Android 6.0 operating system makes a smooth interface and brings support for games, media and productivity apps
  • 4K x 2K resolutions let you enjoy UHD viewing and ensure your at the forefront of the 4K revolution
  • Kodi media player comes preinstalled so you'll have the best TV streaming support with countless hours of free content

H96 Pro+ Android TV Box


Say hello to the H96 Pro+ Android TV Box. With its Octa-Core Amlogic S912 CPU, 3GB or RAM and respectable 32GB of storage this TV box has a nice line up of specs. While this may be commonplace with TV boxes these days the H96 Pro+ stills stands out from the crowd as it sports an unusual and very attractive design featuring a recessed band about its middle and a glossy strip across the top. Measuring a mere 106 x 106 x 20mm this compact TV box weighs just 130 grams so can slip into your jacket pocket or bag, giving you a powerful portable PC that can turn just about any screen into a mini PC and entertainment system.

The left size of the TV box features 2 full-size USB ports while the right side houses the micro SD card slot enabling you to double the storage to a substantial 64GB. At the rear of the H96Pro+ is the HDMI and AV out ports as well as optical SPDIF for flawless audio and DC in port. With a gigabit Ethernet port and built-in Dual Band Wi-Fi antenna, this mini TV box has fast network access so you can easily stream media and download from the Cloud.

This fan-less TV Box brings a commanding performance with its 1.5Ghz CPU and 3GB RAM while a Mali-T820MP3 GPU ensures silky smooth graphics so you can play games and watch movies without any interruptions or distracting noise.

An Android 6.0 operating system brings good support for a full range of apps making this TV box more than just a media station as with a Bluetooth keyboard and mouse you can use it for just like a mini PC. coming with the Kodi media player pre-installed you'll have great access to the full spectrum of media channels be it sports, movies or documentaries so there'll never be any shortage of things to watch. With 4K resolutions and decoding supported you'll be able to view it all in stunning quality and you'll be ready for the 4K revolution.

H96 Pro Android TV Box comes with 12 months warranty, brought to you by the leader in electronic devices as well as wholesale TV boxes and media players.

overview:

Ultra HD 4K TV Box

The MXQ Pro is from well-known TV box makers MXQ comes equipped with an Amlogic S905 SoC which is the newest standard for TV box excellence, This powerful processors brings UHD 4K support at up to 60FPS and with a wide range of formats supported such including H.265 / 10-bit HEVC and AVS+ codecs you can enjoy superb movies that take up very little space due to advanced compression methods.

A highlight of the 2GHz Amlogic S905X Cortex A53 processor is the Penta-Core ARM GPU which take command of all the graphical needs and delivers seamless performance for games movies and everything else you may require with resolutions output at up to 4K (2880x2160). Thanks to the SPDIF port you can even connect to your speakers and play music independently of your TV from radio, from online repositories or your own media library.

There's no need to worry about storage space as with the micros SD card slot you can add up to 32GB or storage or use one of the 4 USB ports with a memory pen. With 4 USB ports there is plenty of options for all your peripherals so by adding a mouse and keyboard your all ready for a home computer and entertainment system that will make your TV truly smart.

Kodi TV Box

While most TV Boxes support Kodi the MXQ Pro makes your life easier by coming with it preinstalled, with plenty of add-ons already there you just need to plug it, power it up and you can access a world of online media from thousands of channels. This TV box also has a host of preinstalled apps as well as the Google Play store bringing you plenty to choose from. With the smart TV box content to your HDMI TV you can catch up on social media like Facebook and Twitter, download a huge amount of games or surf the web and stream video and music with complete ease.

This MXQ Pro Android 6.0 TV box comes with a 12 months warranty, brought to you by the leader in electronic devices as well as wholesale Android TV Boxes.

overview:
Key Features...
  • Realtek RTD1295 ARM CPU, 2GB RAM and T820 MP3 GPU offers the ultimate movie with 4K content
  • ZDMC is Zidoos very own Kodi based media player and comes preinstalled
  • HDMI IN PVR Time shift and Playback to capture inputs from other devices
  • Plenty of storage support with USB 3.0, micro SD card and SATA 3.0 HDD support


Zidoo X9S Android TV Box



The latest X9S TV box from Zidoo take Android TV Boxes to the next level. Like the X9 the new X9S model has a great build quality and a premium finish with its slim brushed metal rectangular shell.

When it comes to ports it's easy to see where the X9S excels. With a USB 3.0 port capable of supporting up to 5GB per second data rates, a micro SD Slot for an extra 32GB of storage and most impressively, a SATA 3.0 port, allowing you to add a hard drive to the device there are plenty of options to store all your media and games.

HDMI IN PVR, Time Shift and Playback



The other unique feature to the Zidoo X9 range is the HDMI in port. This really sets the Zidoo X9S apart from other TV Boxes as it can record from the HDMI in port at 1080p. With the PVR function, you can hook up a satellite cable TV or games box to the Zidoo X9S and record programs, game footage or other content which makes it much more useful than your standard TV box.

The Zidoo X9S features an RDT1295 ARM processor and a Mali T820 GPU which in combination with the 2GB of RAM can easily handle 4K graphics and offer a stunning output with realistic and lifelike pictures in all their glory. Because this setup supports 10 Bit colors you the TV box can differentiate between over 1 billion colors, quite a step up from most TV boxes that only offer 16 million colors. The result is a greater realism in the graduation between shades displayed on the screen for a more authentic picture.

Kodi Media Player Preinstalled



If all this wasn't enough this Android TV box comes preloaded with Zidoo's very own ZDMC media player, this is based on Kodi 16 and means you can enjoy the abundant add-ons with access to thousands of channels showing a full range of content. The Gigabit Ethernet and 802.11 ac dual band Wi-Fi support with 2.4G and 5G support ensure a strong network signal and impressive speeds so you have quick reliable network access no0 matter where in the home you set up this TV Box.

This Zidoo S9S TV box comes with a 12 months warranty, brought to you by the leader in electronic devices as well as wholesale Android TV Boxes.

Coming with a fairly comprehensive remote control that includes 4 buttons for use in conjunction with your TV it's a super little media player with a unique and stylish design. Once powered on a front LCD display brings up the time and the remote will even let you scroll through the LED colors so you can draw attention to this stylish new addition to your home that will light up with cyan, blue or green lighting if you wish.

Making use of the popular Amlogic A912 Octa Core 2GHz Chipset and having 2GB of RAM the T95Z Plus is a well kitted out TV box that delivers in spades when it comes to performance and will serve up 4Kx2K ultra HD resolutions with ease, so you're guaranteed stunning visuals. Ugoos UT6 Android TV Box



The Ugoos UT6 Android TV Box offers the perfect solution to anybody out there that ever has dreamt of turning their regular HD TV into one of those much talked about Android SmartTVs. Supporting 4K resolution, this 4K TV box truly brings along a cinematic experience for those of you that own a 4K TV set. Watch the latest movies in Ultra-HD resolution and enjoy your favorite series and sports games like never before – with its 4K support, this Android TV box certainly lifts your media experience to entirely new heights. Packing 16GB of internal storage, it holds enough space for you to store all your latest downloads. No matter what you use this Android TV box for, you’ll always be treated with breathtaking visuals and stunning details that are guaranteed to put a smile on your face.

full_product_name: MINIX NEO U1 TV Box - 4K UHD, Kodi 16, Quad Core Amlogic S905 CPU, 2GB RAM, Air Mouse, Android 5.1, Dual Band Wi-Fi
overview:
At a Glance...
  • MINIX NEO U1 with Amlogic S905, 2GB of RAM and Mali GPU is a multimedia force to be reckoned with
  • Ultra High Definition 4K output brings the best quality images to your screen
  • Android 5.1 and Kodi 16 bring access to hundreds of channels and all the best Apps
  • Coming with a NEO A2 Air mouse that will make navigation quick and easy

With the Amlogic S905 processor the MINIX NEO U1 is the new flagship TV box from MINIX and is set to show just how far this company has come in perfecting the ultimate home entertainment media hub.

MINIX NEO U1 TV Box


A key feature of the NEO U1 TV box is the ultra high definition video playback and real time video streaming through a Kodi 16.0 media player that comes pre-installed on this system. This offers access to hundreds of channels, with radio, TV and movies so there is always something new to watch or listen to. With the UHD resolutions this TV box is ready for the 4K revolution and supports video output in ultra high definition at up to 60hz so you can enjoy sharp imagery with superior quality movies and games that brings entertainment to life in your living room.

The power house of this micro PC is its Amlogic S905 quad core CPU that's has 2 GHz speeds and runs alongside the penta core Mali 450 GPU, when combined with the 2GB of DDR3 RAM this TV box surpasses most others on the market for processing capabilities and can handle all the latest games and any other tasks you demand of it. When it comes to storage you get 16GB of high performance eMMC flash memory and the micro SD card slot allows you to add 64GB of extra storage should you require it. More than enough room for hours of entertainment.

Android 5.1 TV BOX and NEO A2 Air Mouse


This multimedia TV box comes with an easy to use NEO A2 Air mouse. Having the latest six-axis gyroscope and accelerometer technology this air mouse brings total precision control with easy to use keys and can easily double as a game controller. With a keyboard built in to it you can type emails, update social media pages and surf the web from up to 10 meters away.

The Android 5.1 OS brings loads of choice for apps and games and permits plenty of customization so you can keep everything organized just as you like. With a MINIX front end you also have a quick easy navigation menu for all your favorite options and shortcuts to the most used features.

Dual Band Wi-Fi as well as Bluetooth 4.1 let you connect to internet and other devices for seamless downloading and quick transfer of data. There are also plenty of USB ports for peripherals and an SPDIF so you can hook the player up to your surround sound audio system. This MINIX NEO U1 TV box comes with a 12 months warranty, brought to you by the leader in electronic devices as well as wholesale TV boxes and Mini PCs.

The Q-Box 4K TV Box comes with a 12 months warranty. Brought to you by the leader in electronic devices as well as wholesale Android TV boxes.

Ugoos are back with their latest model that is sure to be a hit for 2017, the AM3. The AM3 TV Box is a compact and unassuming black box but don't let its plain looks fool you. With its aluminum body there's good heat dissipation allowing for a fan-less design so it runs quietly so there's no distractions or interferences.

overview:

  • Enjoy all media in breathtaking 4K resolution
  • Android 6.0 Operating System for a smooth user experience
  • Powerful Octa-Core Processor and 3GB RAM to meet your toughest media demands
  • Dual-Band Wi-Fi lets you browse the web and download files at lightning speeds


4K TV Box Sunvell T95Z Plus



With the Sunvell T95Z Plus TV box, you’ll be able to experience a cinematic experience from the comfort of your own living room. Supporting 4K resolution, this Android TV box is capable of portraying all your favorite movies in absolutely breathtaking quality that is guaranteed to blow your mind. Bringing forth vivid color and stunning detail, you’ll be able to enjoy movies, series, and games like never before. Sit back, relax, and let this 4K TV Box take you away into a world of mobile entertainment. With this smart home accessory at your side, you and your loved ones will never experience a moment of boredom again.

Featuring a cool hexagon shaped design and intergraded LED color lights, this Android TV box is a true asset to the interior or any modern household or game room. Within its stylish body, it packs the epic Amlogic S912 processor. As an Octa-Core CPU, this piece of hardware has been designed to deliver a powerful performance capable of dealing with the most demanding of tasks. Additionally, it also comes with 3GB RAM, allowing you to multitask and enjoy numerous of its Android features at once without experiencing any lag. full_product_name: K1 PLUS 4K Android TV Box - Amlogic S905 Quad Core CPU, 4 USB Ports, DVB-T2+ DVB-S2, Kodi, DLNA, AirPlay, Miracast
overview:
Key Features...
  • Powerful Android TV Box with 4Kx2K resolution and H.265 decoding
  • Convenient Android 5.1 interface and pre-installed Kodi 15.2
  • 4 USB ports allow for simultaneous use of several storage devices
  • DVB-T2 and DVB-S2 offer extra functionality, including access to satellite digital TV


The K1 Plus is a compact Android TV box. But don’t be fooled by its small size. With 4 USB ports, Amlogic S905 Quad Core 64Bit CPU, pre-installed Kodi and more – the K1 Plus is an entertainment powerhouse.

Android 5.1 TV Box with 4 USB Ports + DVB-T2 and DVB-S2

The K1 Plus TV box can not only add a few smart features to your TV, but pretty much transform your screen into a complete home entertainment centre. Android 5.1 on a big screen guarantees easy navigation and a convenient interface for managing your media. What’s more, you will have Kodi 15.2 pre-installed – and that means access to great free content online.

With 4K decoding support, the TV box will do the latest blockbusters justice by showing them in great quality. With H.265 encoding, your content can be efficiently stored on the TV box without taking up too much storage while preserving original quality. You will get 8 GB of internal memory + 32GB supported externally. The TV box supports DLNA/AirPlay/Miracastand Netflix.

The K1 Plus Android TV Box comes with 4 USB ports – giving you access to 4 different content sources simultaneously. With the built-in optical port, you will be able to enjoy high sound quality with not distortion and even set up a surround sound system for your home. You can set it right beside your TV or even hook up to the wall to save space thanks to the convenient mounts at the bottom.

This 4K TV box comes with DVB-T2 and DVB-S2 ports that enable even more functionality. The DVB-S2 or Digital Video Broadcasting - Satellite - Second Generation is a digital TV broadcast standard that allows your TV box to you to connect your dish antenna to receive TV channels available via satellite. The DVB-T2 port makes the TV box compatible with older TV sets.

The K1 PLUS 4K Android TV Box comes with a 12 months warranty, brought to you by the leader in electronic devices as well as wholesale

overview:
MINIX NEO X7 Mini TV Box is a scaled-down version of the NEO X7, however it has a Quad Core CPU, 2GB RAM, 8GB ROM, Android 4.2 OS, HDMI Output, DLNA, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity.

Small But Mighty TV Box


Size is not always everything, take for example the NEO X7 Mini, which is a smaller and more compact version of the MEO X7 TV Box. Utilizing the same internals as the NEO X7 TV hub, this NEO X7 Mini, though in a smaller form, is a vastly powerful device, delivering optimum performance far beyond what you would expect from its miniature size.

Its bigger and larger predecessor was widely acclaimed to be the best on the market, but the MINIX NEO X7 Mini is no exception and also comes with a quad core ARM Cortex-A9 1.6GHz processor. When this quad core processor is teamed with the quad core Mali-400 GPU and 2GB of RAM, the end result is a performance that leaves the competition standing still as you effortlessly multi-task.

The Next Generation of Smart TV Boxes


Do what you want to do with the Android operating system that this fun sized NEO X7 Mini TV box uses. You can sit on their sofa and use the large HD TV to interact with all the applications that your smartphone or tablet might have but on a much large scale. Download games or install useful and practical apps that are on offer from the Google Play store and let the NEO X7 Mini really take them to the next level in fun and entertainment.

Like the NEO X7, the NEO X7 Mini comes with full Bluetooth 4.0 support and is compatible with most Bluetooth keyboards, mouse and Android game controllers making it ideal for enhancing your gaming experience on the MINIX NEO X7 Mini Series. Store media files directly onto the 8GB of internal memory or give it a boost by inserting a SD card of up to 32GB into the allocated slot. Plus with HDMI, you can watch media in high quality directly onto your compatible HD television set.

The NEO X7 Mini features Wi-Fi Display and DLNA, therefore enabling you to share media content, such as videos, music, photos, between your smartphone, tablet, laptop and your TV. As a result no more tangled cables connecting your laptop to the TV as the need for wires and cables is reduced heavily and more wireless freedom is offered. Forget about squinting when using your small screen smart phone, enjoy the apps in king size.

4K Android TV Box


This stunning Android media player is powered by a Realtek RTD1295 SoC that has been specifically designed for TV boxes. Added to this is a three-core ARM T820 GPU and 2GB of RAM that delivers an outstanding media performance. The H.265 hardware decoding means that 4K UHD content will be handled with ease delivering the best resolutions to your screen. With Gigabit Ethernet support and dual channel Wi-Fi downloading videos, streaming movies or playing games online will be a smooth seamless experience without lag or dropped frames

Android 6.0 TV Box With Kodi


Android 6.0 is the operating platform of choice on this TV Box and brings access to a wealth of media apps and games. With Kodi preinstalled you will find countless channels to watch the latest sporting events, TV shows and blockbusters without the need for expensive monthly subscriptions.

The brushed metal black Kodi TV box is about the same size as most set-top boxes and has twin Wi-Fi antennas protruding from the rear. The front of the TV box has a back-lit power button and large LCD display that shows the time and other data. On the right is a USB port and HDD slot where you can add up to 8TB of storage, so you'll never run short on space and can store a huge media library. The rear of this TV box has a mass of ports with connectivity for HDMI, optical audio out and SPDIF as well as a second USB 2.0, a USB 3.0 and Type C port so there's no shortage of connectivity. There is even an SD card slot on the right that supports up to 64GB cards. With all this potential you this exceptional TV Box makes a great media hub to store and control all the music, movies, games and TV shows for the whole family.

This sleek Android TV Box comes with 12 months warranty, brought to you by the leader in electronic devices as well as wholesale TV boxes and mini PCs.

full_product_name: ZIDOO X9 Android TV Box - 4K TV, HDMI-In 1080p Recorder, HDMI PIP, MSTAR Quad Core CPU, 2GB RAM, KODI Support, Wi-Fi, Blutooth
overview:
At a Glance...
  • Watch movies and shows, play games and more with the Zidoo X9 Android TV Box
  • Have two pictures displayed simultaneously with the HDMI Picture-in-Picture
  • Record new episodes or whole movies thanks to the HDMI-In Recorder
  • Enjoy smooth navigation with Android OS and a great media experience with KODI support

The Zidoo X9 Android TV Box comes with a number of innovative features and a sleek minimalistic design. Have it in your living room, office or take it traveling to always have access to great entertainment wherever you are.

HDMI Picture in Picture + HDMI In Recorder


The Zidoo X9 comes with a set of specific features that make it stand apart from other TV boxes on the market. One of these features in HDMI In PIP (Picture-in-Picture). This X9 claims to be the only Android Box that can support HDMI IN Picture in Picture (PIP) function. This allows you to have two pictures displayed simultaneously, with one being full screen and the other shown as an inset window. So you can watch the news headlines without missing the football game.

Another unique function of this Android TV box is HDMI In 1080p Recording, which is another first and showes just how well Zidoo is leading the field with the X9 TV box. With this function you can easily record your favorite movies and shows in HD and watch them whenever time allows you. The Zidoo X9 TV Box comes with 8GB of internal memory and you can expand that up to 32GB - plenty of space to have a nice collection of media right in your TV Box. Coming with 4K video decoding and the support of 4K video, the Zidoo X9 is a perfect entertainment hub for your home and a will let you view ultra high definition showes.

Android OS + KODI Support


The TV box comes with a convenient and intuitive Android OS, meaning your navigation will be smooth and easy, and you can enrich your media experience further by paying a visit to the Play Store where there are countless games and entertainment option on offer.

KODI, formerly known as XBMC, is an award-winning free and open media centre, that you can use to play music and games, watch videos and more. The Zidoo X9 is KODI friendly, and easily installed on your TV box. Featuring the MSTAR MSO9180D1R Quad Core CPU and Mali-450 GPU, the TV box comes with extensive media capabilities, fast processing speeds and lots of multitasking opportunities.

The Zidoo X9 Android TV Box comes with 12 months warranty. Brought to you by the leader in electronic devices as well as wholesale Android TV boxes, Chinavasion.

overview:
Key Features...
  • HDMI 2.0 brings stunning 4K visuals for faultless viewing
  • Dual Band Wi-Fi and Gigabit Ethernet brings speedy downloads with or without wires
  • HDMI in allows for PVR Time shift and Playback at 1080P
  • Zidoo ZDMC media player utilizes Kodi 16 for thousands of channels packed with free content.

Zidoo X8 TV box


Meet the Zidoo X8 TV box - powered by a quad-core Realtek SoC and with 2GB or RAM the X8 Android TV box is an affordable home entertainment system that can do it all. An HDMI 2.0 port allows the Zidoo X8 TV box to support 4K outputs while the ARM Mali T820 MP3 GPU delivers high-quality image processing for a smooth performance in displaying all your media be it the latest games or blockbuster movies. There's a HDMI in port as well for PIP function via UDP making in one of only a few TV boxes capable of supporting HDMI in PVR time shift and playback in 1080P.

Running on Android 6.0 there is no shortage of media applications available such as Netflix and Hula. Additionally, the X8 media box comes with the Zidoo ZDMC media player pre-installed, based on Kodi 16.0 it provides access to thousands of channels from around the world, so there's never a shortage of entertainment to be had from this TV box.

This sleek little media player has a host of ports including 3 USB ports, 1 of which is USB 3.0 for delivering faster data speeds while the other 2 are HDMI 2.0 which allows for additional storage such as u disks. The on board storage can also be complemented with the micro SD card slot allowing an extra 32GB of memory to be added. With an optical port you will get crystal-clear audio to match the high-res images supported on this device, and with gigabit Ethernet and dual-band WIFI you can enjoy faster data connectivity with or without cables.


The Zidoo X8 TV box come with 12 months warranty, brought to you by the leader in electronic devices as well as wholesale TV boxes.
